com.bigdata.ganglia

Class AbstractGangliaMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.ganglia.AbstractGangliaMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGangliaMessage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GangliaMetadataMessage, GangliaMetricMessage, GangliaRequestMessage

    public abstract class AbstractGangliaMessage
extends Object
implements IGangliaMessage
    Base class for ganglia 3.1 wire format messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      abstract boolean equals(Object o) 
      String getHostName()
      The name of the host for which the metric was reported.
      String getMetricName()
      The name of the metric (this needs to be clean for use in a file system so the application name of the metric needs to be munged before it is saved here).
      GangliaMessageTypeEnum getRecordType()
      The code for the type of message.

      • getHostName

        public String getHostName()
        Description copied from interface: IGangliaMessage
        The name of the host for which the metric was reported.

        Note: When IGangliaMessage.isSpoof() reports true this will be ip:host.

        Specified by:
        getHostName in interface IGangliaMessage

      • getMetricName

        public String getMetricName()
        Description copied from interface: IGangliaMessage
        The name of the metric (this needs to be clean for use in a file system so the application name of the metric needs to be munged before it is saved here).
        Specified by:
        getMetricName in interface IGangliaMessage

      • isSpoof

        public boolean isSpoof()
        Description copied from interface: IGangliaMessage
        true iff this is a spoofed message.

        Note: Spoof messages format IGangliaMessage.getHostName() as ip:host and provide a means to fake metrics for a host which is down (or which is not running ganglia).

        Specified by:
        isSpoof in interface IGangliaMessage
